trans-unit.source: Represents a control expression that handles multiple selections by passing control to <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase"></xref>.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase"></xref> objects for the switch.
The collection of <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase"></xref> objects.
Gets the equality comparison method, if any.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodInfo"></xref> object representing the equality comparison method.
Gets the test for the switch.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> object representing the test for the switch.
Returns the node type of this Expression.
Extension nodes should return <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension"></xref> when overriding this method.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType"></xref> of the expression.
Gets the test for the switch.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> object representing the test for the switch.
Gets the static type of the expression that this <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> represents.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression.Type"></xref> that represents the static type of the expression.
Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression.SwitchValue"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression.Cases"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression.DefaultBody"></xref> property of the result.
This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
